example_sentence_english: I am looking for an experienced waitress.
The waitress is coming right away.

notes: plural form; homograph of masculine singular "cameriere"

example_sentence_english: We are looking for some seasonal waitresses.

notes: contraction of di + le; identical in form to partitive plural
example_sentence_italian: Il turno delle cameriere finisce alle dieci.
example_sentence_english: The waitresses' shift ends at ten.

example_sentence_italian: Ho dato il conto alla cameriera.
example_sentence_english: I gave the bill to the waitress.

example_sentence_italian: Abbiamo ricevuto i menù dalla cameriera.
example_sentence_english: We received the menus from the waitress.

example_sentence_italian: I clienti hanno ricevuto l'acqua dalle cameriere.
example_sentence_english: The customers received water from the waitresses.
We have trust in the waitresses.

example_sentence_italian: Ho letto un commento sulla cameriera.
example_sentence_english: I read a comment about the waitress.
There is an article about the waitresses.
